title: Russian election system, when second round?

content.question: A second round of voting is held in a Russian presidential election when

choices.label: no candidate receives a plurality of the vote in the first round
no candidate receives a majority of the vote in the first round
voter turnout in the first round is less than 75 percent
more than three candidates receive more than 25 percent of the vote in the first round
the difference in votes between the top two candidates in the first round is less thanÂ 5 percent

content.answer: no candidate receives a majority of the vote in the first round
